description.value: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Composite Shortbow]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Glaive]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longspear]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longsword]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Shortbow]{Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spear]{Spear}, and all conrasu weapons(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Buugeng]{Buugeng}) in which you are trained.
